snippet: The organizers of the parade lifted the ban on openly gay groups last year, but critics say the changes are too incremental.
abstract: Organizers of New York City's St Patrick's Day Parade say they will authorize two LGBT groups to march in 2016 parade, double number that was allowed in 2015.
lead_paragraph: The organizers of the parade lifted the ban on openly gay groups last year, but critics say the changes are too incremental.

headline.main: Gay Groups Marching in New York’s St. Patrick’s Day Parade Double to Two
headline.print_headline: 2 Gay Groups Will Be Allowed to March in St. Patrick’s Parade
